channel.title: Good free website maker?
channel.description: I'm wanting to make a website for free for my private server. Anyone know any good ones? Thanks. Also, it needs to be able to have forums and a xat box!

item.title: Good free website maker?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Unicron, post:7, topic:426967”][quote author=lemme_winks_ link=topic=529666.msg3866666#msg3866666 date=1325044517]

Dreamweaver (pirated, because you need money to buy the real one. And I am NOT saying you should pirate it, however I AM admitting I pirated it myself at one point in my life)

you’re such a bad-ass
[/quote]
nope, just your average ordinary everyday motherfucker.[/quote]

Is that a Jon laJoie reference?

Read full topic

item.title: Good free website maker?
item.dc:creator: @Unicron Unicron
item.description:
@Unicron wrote:

Dreamweaver (pirated, because you need money to buy the real one. And I am NOT saying you should pirate it, however I AM admitting I pirated it myself at one point in my life)
Also you could always get web-hosting that includes cpanel with quickinstall.

Read full topic

item.title: Good free website maker?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“lemme_winks_, post:2, topic:426967”]don’t use webhosts that do all the work for you.

#1 - drag-and-drop lets you do a lot, but not everything.
#2 - less experience–you also don’t get to say any of the work was solely yours
#3 - your website has to function just like everyone else’s website that used that webhost, so your website isn’t unique.

you can always use pre-made style templates for you website. just make sure you give the original creator credits or it makes you look bad.

here are the bad-ass ones:

Styleshout

Free Website Templates, High-Quality Handcrafted by Styleshout

We provide an awesome collection of high-quality free website templates. Our handcrafted designs are the best free website templates you can find on the web


http://www.freecsstemplates.org/

if you just want a forum, here are a few free forum engines that i would suggest:
http://www.mybb.com/ (like vbulletin)
http://www.simplemachines.org/ (like this one)
http://www.phpbb.com/ (has really cool features, but hard to get used to)

here’s vbulletin
https://www.vbulletin.com/

ps: it’s like $300

some recommended free webhosts:

x10hosting.com
heliohost.org

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL and cPanel, No Ads

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, free Website Builder, cPanel and no ads. Almost unlimited free website hosting and free domain hosting. Host website for Free.

a list of them: http://www.free-webhosts.com/webhosting-01.php

if you’re a do-it-yourself kinda guy:

look at xampp, apache servers, or sqllite

http://www.sqlite.org/
http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp.html

if you want to embed php into your website (for doing background stuff): http://www.php.net/

if you MUST use a web creator, here are a few good ones i would suggest:

good luck[/quote][quote=“Brandon Codes, post:1, topic:426967”]I’m wanting to make a website for free for my private server. Anyone know any good ones? Thanks.
Also, it needs to be able to have forums and a xat box![/quote]
The best advice you’re going to get.

Read full topic

item.title: Good free website maker?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Xat sucks.

I suggest you learn PHP. Not that complicated.

If you have fast internet, host by yourself via the programs which he^ suggested.

Otherwise use those free webhosts. Keep in mind, they’re free. Don’t rely on them.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Good free website maker?
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

don’t use webhosts that do all the work for you.

#1 - drag-and-drop lets you do a lot, but not everything.
#2 - less experience–you also don’t get to say any of the work was solely yours
#3 - your website has to function just like everyone else’s website that used that webhost, so your website isn’t unique.

you can always use pre-made style templates for you website. just make sure you give the original creator credits or it makes you look bad.

here are the bad-ass ones:

Styleshout

Free Website Templates, High-Quality Handcrafted by Styleshout

We provide an awesome collection of high-quality free website templates. Our handcrafted designs are the best free website templates you can find on the web


http://www.freecsstemplates.org/

if you just want a forum, here are a few free forum engines that i would suggest:
http://www.mybb.com/ (like vbulletin)
http://www.simplemachines.org/ (like this one)
http://www.phpbb.com/ (has really cool features, but hard to get used to)

here’s vbulletin
https://www.vbulletin.com/

ps: it’s like $300

some recommended free webhosts:

x10hosting.com
heliohost.org

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL and cPanel, No Ads

Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, free Website Builder, cPanel and no ads. Almost unlimited free website hosting and free domain hosting. Host website for Free.

a list of them: http://www.free-webhosts.com/webhosting-01.php

if you’re a do-it-yourself kinda guy:

look at xampp, apache servers, or sqllite

http://www.sqlite.org/
http://www.apachefriends.org/en/xampp.html

if you want to embed php into your website (for doing background stuff): http://www.php.net/

if you MUST use a web creator, here are a few good ones i would suggest:

good luck
